column.name: batch
column.description: custom identifier used to group documents

column.name: cluster
column.description: used to group documents by some attribute

column.name: template_repository_id
column.description: the id of the repository in which the master template is stored

column.name: master_template
column.description: the name of the master template, will be used if not overridden

column.name: overrideable_flag
column.description: if set, the template will be editable/overrideable

column.name: generation_date
column.description: date in which the document will be finalized
